page.title: 07WHERE I LIVE.
page.content: I live at 6,Richardson Rd.,{Stockton.} Nearby,there are two parks;Ropner Park and "Riggy's Field." Ropner has a duck pond,swings,and lots of room to play in.Opposite my house is an old school no longer in use. Riggy's Field has a BMX obstacle course.I live near {St. {Cuthbert's Church.}On Sunday's,when Mass has finished,we usually have a chat outside the church. The house that I live in is a Brosely house.It is about 3 and a half years old.St.Cuthbert's School,where I go,is fifteen minutes walk from my house,but I go in the car.
